properties.name: Diesel Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat  257 Elm Street, Somerville, MA, 02144Diesel Cafe 617-629-8717

properties.name: Diva's Indian Bistro
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat 246 Elm St 02144My favorite restaraunt

properties.name: I fell for you....
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat woodmar dr houghton, miI was in the lab that day, begging for a car ride. You offered. I figured I could take you if you tried anything funny. You took me to do my laundry in exchange for cookies. My clothes got dirtier at the laundry from the lipstick someone left in a dryer. We went back to your place to re-wash my clothes. I hung out there for hours. You were my first friend after my disasterous break up. I fell in love with you.

properties.name: I helped you move and then I kissed you....
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat kenoza ave,01832You started as my student, became my best friend and I fell in love with you. Only, you didn\'t know. That is, you didn\'t know until you told me you wished you could kiss me, so I kissed you. You\'re beautiful.

properties.name: I lost her....
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat petoskey rd, charlevoix miMy first girl love died here in a car accident. I was mad for her. I didn\'t get enough time with her. It wasn\'t fair.

properties.name: I was born here - Lockwood MacDonald Hospital
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat 1 macdonald dr 49770Back in 1977 it was a general hospital, although now it is a mental health ward.

properties.name: Manray
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000 21 Brookline Street, Cambridge, MACurrently closed, but sponsoring gay-friendly events. See their site. I used to dance to Nine Inch Nails here when I was in college.

properties.name: My early teen years
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat liberty st, 49770I had my first kiss with a boy here. I wasn\'t thrilled, but it was what was expected of me. I grew up here from ages of 11 to 16.

properties.name: My first con
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat 700 Main st 04106So, you took me to my first con. We stayed up all night that first night talking and making love. It was nice. I was afraid of your friends, but you managed to keep me sane and you let me know I was safe. Your friends warmed up to me right away and I was glad to be there.

properties.name: Romantic Weekend Getaway
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat 284 Western ave augusta, meWe ran off for a weekend to a spa, in search of a big bathtub. It was magnificent. We spent the whole weekend in for the most part, watching movies and taking baths and just getting lost in one another.

properties.name: True Love
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat bay shore, miYou were the first girl I ever truly loved. I adored you. You were a part of my life for 10 years and I\'ll never ever forget you. When I think of you, it still reminds me how much I love you.

properties.name: Waterfire
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat providence, riI love walking the streets here, enjoying the fires and the music. It always makes my day.

properties.name: We forgot the world
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat I was 18. You were the first boy I actually loved. Before that, it was only women. You taught me the joys of public displays of affection here. We made out on the sidewalk, under the sun with you pressing me against the wall. You wouldn\'t sleep with me, so I cheated on you. You had babies and I have cats. We never would have worked out, but it was one helluva summer.

properties.name: Where I first saw you
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat 676 island pond rd, manchester, nhI saw you in the hall, but you didn\'t see me. I drooled and was careful not to get caught. I nonchalantly asked someone who my students would be. You were on the list. I was thrilled. Eye candy for a little while for me is what I figured. You ended up being so much more.

properties.name: Where I spent the first 10 years of my life
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat 1620 clarion ave,49770This used to be a dirt dead end rd with an old falling apart house that lacked indoor plumbing. That is where I grew up, not the shiny house that\'s there now. My childhood pets are still buried there, though as is a lot of my past in the dirt hidden there.

properties.name: You told me you liked my shoes....
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat 330 billerica rd chelmsford, maYeah, you walked into my classroom that day and all I could think was, "Wow, he\'s actually in here," as I secretly tried to keep from being obvious about how attractive I thought you were. I hadn\'t had a chance to meet you in New Hampshire. Your eyes killed me and your shoulders were to die for. You told me you liked my shoes and inside I was screaming that I wanted to ask for your phone number, but you had a gf and I had a bf, so it just wouldn\'t work. Plus, you were my student.

properties.name: my first vacation on my own
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykatnew orleans LAIt wasn\'t truly on my own. K lived there, but it was the first time I went anywhere for fun by myself.

properties.name: my later teen years
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat bridge st,49770I grew up here my senior year of high school. I made out with that first boy I was truly attracted to. We used to roll around on the livingroom floor of my mother\'s apartment. We couldn\'t keep our hands off one another. It was amazing.

properties.name: the summer between my junior and senior years of HS
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat3201 Burton grand rapids, miI went here for a summer term. It\'s here at a Christian College that I learned about strange sexual proclivities.
